body:
It's dead again.

```
bradfitz@laptop ~$ ssh builder@140.211.168.57
ssh: connect to host 140.211.168.57 port 22: Network is unreachable
bradfitz@laptop ~$ ping 140.211.168.57
PING 140.211.168.57 (140.211.168.57): 56 data bytes
Request timeout for icmp_seq 0
Request timeout for icmp_seq 1
Request timeout for icmp_seq 2
92 bytes from 140-211-168-57-openstack.osuosl.org (140.211.168.57): Destination Host Unreachable
Vr HL TOS  Len   ID Flg  off TTL Pro  cks      Src      Dst
 4  5  20 5400 92c5   0 0000  36  01 7790 172.31.153.7  140.211.168.57 

```
